ygData.subject: Re: Petition update
ygData.msgSnippet: If you ve already voted no need to vote again.  I can make some changes to comments if need be.  I ve also added a field for Warrior level to see what
ygData.messageBody:
If you've already voted no need to vote again. I can make some changes to
comments if need be. I've also added a field for Warrior level to see what
non-warriors and different level warriors opinions are. If you signed up
before this field was there I would like to post your level, just let me
know what it is, and what your account is so I know which to change.

Make sure everyone you know signs the petition either for or against,
preferably for. Having some non-warrior opinions won't hurt.

Trent Carroll
Programmer
Houston Baptist University
(281) 649-3410

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Patricia Halas [mailto:patty_halas@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 2:37 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Petition update
>
>
> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>
> Woohoo, I still agree. Do I need to vote again?
>
> "Death to all Orcs!"
> - Patty of Halas just before Dvinn Backstabs her 4 times for 40 points
> and her lifeless body slumps to the cold hard ground.
>
>
> >From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
> >Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> >To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [warriors_eq] Petition update
> >Date: Wed, 23 Jun 1999 14:10:31 -0500
> >
> >From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
> >
> >The petition has been updated as follows.
> >
> >1. 6 points per level instead of 5. Some people thought 7 was
> too high.
> >6
> >allows combat skill to cap at about 300. Slightly higher than 255, but
> >allowing 6 per level allows warrior to be better in melee combat before
> >Level 41 when the skill cap would supposedly no longer be in effect
> >
> >2. Added that there needed to be a skill unique to warriors
> only. Weapon
> >Specialization was the suggested ability.
> >
> >Trent Carroll
> > Programmer
> > Houston Baptist University
> > (281) 649-3410
> >
> >
